name: Disengaging Feint
text: You can feint to disengage from combat.
benefit: As a standard action, use Bluff to feint against an opponent. Instead of denying that opponent his Dexterity bonus to AC, a successful feint allows you to move up to your speed without provoking an attack of opportunity from the opponent you feinted for leaving the square you start in.
staminaText: You can select this feat even if you don’t meet the ability score prerequisite (Intelligence 13). You gain the benefits of this feat only as long as you have at least 1 stamina point in your stamina pool. You can spend 5 stamina points to attempt a Disengaging Feint as a move action instead of a standard action.
prerequisites_zh: 智力13，寓守于攻，精通虚招。
benefit_zh: 以一个标准动作，对一个敌人进行唬骗检定以使用虚招。成功的虚招不会使他失去AC敏捷加值，而是让你能以你的正常移动速度离开他的威胁范围，并且不会受到他的借机攻击。
staminaText_zh: 即使能力不满足前提（13智力），只要耐力池依然有1点耐力就可以使用该专长。如果花费5点耐力，可以用移动动作尝试虚招脱离。
